messages.message:
Brian
Hey!
herro!

Brian
I've been meaning to ask you, where were you when MiM0SA was at the Opheum!?
*Orpheum

hahahaha
i knooowwww.
that was last night?

Brian
No, couple weeks ago.  Oh man, you missed a good show.
reeeeeally?! what day was it? i was in Tucson for a week....

Brian
december 8th.
what is your number, I could have texted you, we even had an extra ticket, and it wasn't sold out.

damn!
ah, it was a Thursday... i work that day...

Brian
It was so great, I saw them Thursday night in Tempe, then drove up and the Flagstaff production was like 5 times the size, it was really impressive.

520.481.6459
that's amazing! any live footage?

Brian
cool, next time I am in town for something I'll give you a heads up.
did you just move to Scottsdale?

Brian
fuck I do have it, I must have gotten it from you last time.

awesome!
LOL
what's yours?

Brian
someone else posted something: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M5qqTGTDDvc
480-466-0856
I moved to Scottsdale in February.  Just getting in to the swing of things.
have a nice new years eve?

cool. cause i was gonna say you're in FLG a lot lol.
yeah, fantastic NYE!
you?
that show looks amazing!

yeah, fantastic NYE!
you?
that show looks amazing!

Brian
yeah, couple times.  I have a bunch of friends there, but it's hard to get everyone together.
yeah, do you guys still do the bbq tuesdays/

Brian
I was just in Vegas last night, I saw http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wyx6JDQCslE
People still do them, but I haven't been to one in a long time.
https://www.facebook.com/groups/crazycookouts/

same.
haha, you saw LMFAO?!
was it good?

Brian
yes, it was amazing!
wow, NYE in Vegas! i bet that was a trip lol

Brian
yeah, I don't think I ever want to do that again.

hahahaha
do you play left 4 dead on xbox by chance?

Brian
I do not, do you?

lol yes. trying to get a small group!
Bryan and i play all the time for funsies.
it sucks cause almost everyone is super serious when we play online.

Brian
oh that's awesome

well i better get going. gotta call my mom before she gets to bed haha.
hope you're enjoying your new years day!
i'll see ya at EK friday?

Brian
yeah, goodnight!
sometime, probably not this weekend
awww

Brian
yeah

Brian
Thank you for the connect!
of course! long time no connect! how ya been?

Brian
asleep.  I'm fading in an out of existence. this feels strange.

how strange. i feel the same exact way.
everything okay?

Brian
yes, my wife is keeping me steady.  applying for jobs.  really bored with everything except my one ambition.  work for AI.

oh? what did you do previously?
as in artificial intelligence?
when did you get married? congrats!
she's gorgeous. is she a model?

Brian
worked for studysauce.com education site for students.  iOS app too.  It's pretty cool.  I applied for Pacific Northwest National laboratory.  That's the only job I can really get excited about.
She should be.  She has amazing legs and a miniskirt today.
Thank you!
that's great. when will you know if you got it or not?

Brian
I always had enormous respect for your intelligence.  I miss our conversations.
Probably this month.
Why are you fading?  I think it is FB causing it.
aww. thanks!

Brian
People don't use messenger enough.

eh, i have my reasons. life has just been chaotic for far too long now.
i'm sort of looking for a temporary job myself.
i have thought about disabling FB for a while, though.
too much of a distraction of sad news.

Brian
I am trying to reconnect with people.  Work has kept me under a rock for 6 years so I've missed out a lot.  I am trying to troll people with kindness.
My wife disables it regularly.
are you happy you're reconnecting on social media again?

Brian
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Upekkha
Upekkha - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Upekkhā (in Pali: upekkhā ऊपेक्खा; Sanskrit: upekṣā उपेक्षा), is the Buddhist concept of equanimity. As one of the Brahma Vihara (meditative states), it is a pure mental state cultivated on the Buddhist path to nirvāna.
en.wikipedia.org
Happiness is extensive.  Just a matter of time.  Is it possible to make other people smile with compliments and personal conversation?

if it's possible to love someone without knowing them, then i think it's possible to make others smile with compliments and basic conversation.
besides, people love compliments.
sadly, no one is appreciated enough.
at least that's my experience.
so, why don't you work at your previous job anymore, if you don't mind me asking?
so, why don't you work at your previous job anymore, if you don't mind me asking?

Brian
wow, this sounds profound to me, "if it's possible to love someone without knowing them"
The client we are working with is taking too long, he doesn't want to scale unless we have 1 good contract.  I don't know anything about sales.  I tried to ask my boss about it but I don't think he has time to explain.

Brian
Since I've already earned his trust, I send him pretty absurd messages, like yesterday I told him after he wouldn't connect with someone on LinkedIn for a job I wanted "That's 3 Peter" referring to the bible which he is very familiar.  He responded "I just gave you a reference call"

Brian
lol
Absurd I am sure.

but you've worked there for years? i guess i'm not understanding the reasoning for leaving? either way, it sounds like you're ready to take on a new challenge.
good for you!
did you apply for Pacific Northwest National Laboratory in Portland?

Brian
The client is taking too long so he wants to only pay me for a few hours here or there to maintain.
Yes

there are no other clients?
sorry to hear that... about the client, that is.

Brian
Yeah, annoying
What have you been up to?

refiguring life. [:
i moved out here to Portland a year and a half ago... quit my job at Gore to focus on building a small photo biz.

Brian
Oh that is awesome.  Why did you leave Gore?
besides that, nothing too exciting.

Brian
I was thinking to apply.

i was working ridiculous amount of hours each week remotely from home, wasn't being respected or appreciated for the hard work i'd put in, i hated most of my co-worker's, got bored of the work, i can go on...
you should definitely apply.
it's a good company. worked there for 6 years. but now it's time to do something different.

Brian
Wow. that is amazing.  I really don't see much opportunity in Flagstaff unfortunately.

well, i was working from home in Portland with Gore. so location didn't matter. 
but yes, after living in FLG for 11+ years, it was time to GTFO.

Brian
Agree.
Iga has only lived in the same place for like 3 years max
so you guys are willing to relocate if you get a job out here?

Brian
Yeah definitely. I would relocate to work for DARPA
well, i wish you the best of luck to you both. i'm sure it'll all work out for you two. [:

Brian
I think so too.  Good luck on mixing it up!  You are a beautiful person.
thanks. [:

Brian
Can you send Joe Flieger a compliment? I want him to play my game.

Play your game?
Why can't you just compliment him?

Brian
I already did
I haven't spoken to him in forever.

Brian
hilarity ensues when he gets enough and thinks this is really weird.
Haha. He thinks everything is already weird. [:

Brian
haha probably.  did he say something?
I haven't spoken to him in ages.

Brian
Hmm, I think he's really down right now.
Aren't we all.

Brian
I'm not
Maybe you should ask him?

Brian
haha, that would defeat the purpose of my game.
Well, I have no reason to talk to him.

Brian
I gave you a reason
And I refuse to play. [:

Brian
HA!  so negative

You haven't given me a valid reason to play your game.
I'm confused.

Brian
Karma?

Brian
If you say something nice, I am willing to bet someone will say something really nice to you tomorrow
I say nice things every day because I heartfully mean it. Don't expect it in return.

Brian
But you got a compliment from me today, right?
Sometimes people need to be reminded what's important.
And what's important, exactly?
